name: FetchOnboardingFormFields
description:
Retrieve all fields from the onboarding request form.

Use this tool to get a list of fields contained in the onboarding initiator form via Freshservice.

parameters.name: onboarding_form_request_body
parameters.description: A JSON structure defining fields for the onboarding initiator form, including placeholder, label, name, position, whether it's required, default values, field type, dynamic sections, choices, and sections.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Freshservice API.
